title: ICE when invalid string literal used with macro

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { println!(""y); } ``` ### Error output Multiple ICEs reported including "TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported" and "broken MIR"
Full output

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/expr.rs:358:39 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/coercion.rs:172:49 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/coercion.rs:1014:53 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_mir_build/src/build/mod.rs:637:18 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:3 ~ att[35b6]::main) ("return type"): bad type [type error] --> att.rs:1:1 | 1 | fn main() { | ^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/mod.rs:520:13 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/mod.rs:768:20 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:3 ~ att[35b6]::main) (LocalDecl { mutability: Mut, local_info: None, internal: false, is_block_tail: None, ty: [type error], user_ty: None, source_info: SourceInfo { span: att.rs:1:1: 1:10 (#0), scope: scope[0] } }): bad type [type error] --> att.rs:1:1 | 1 | fn main() { | ^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/mod.rs:520:13 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at /rustc/1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/relate.rs:425:59 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1609:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x10e9572a6 - ::fmt::h1901ec5c10c2d477 1: 0x10e9b5e2a - core::fmt::write::h453ba3b763f16dfb 2: 0x10e94964c - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h35935f9cf41659e0 3: 0x10e95708a - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h48cb2ddd4d16ad05 4: 0x10e95a3d3 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::hf85401495f021b7c 5: 0x10e95a128 - std::panicking::default_hook::hcc698ed67aaec0db 6: 0x118c0b5fd - rustc_driver[c6bc39476a4ff69]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 7: 0x10e95abb7 - std[e853a6d0ec043b70]::panicking::begin_panic:: 11: 0x11d662399 - std[e853a6d0ec043b70]::panic::panic_any:: 12: 0x11d669742 - ::flush_delayed::, &str> 13: 0x11d6683ac - ::flush_delayed 14: 0x118cd98d7 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hb253bfeab5e611e1 21: 0x7ff807a764e1 - __pthread_start note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (1eb62b123 2022-11-27) running on x86_64-apple-darwin query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to 9 previous errors ```

### Regression Regression in nightly-2022-11-18 from bebd57a9602e48431c90274fbf7d96683b0708b6 (#102944, @nnethercote) ### Version ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (1eb62b123 2022-11-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233 commit-date: 2022-11-27 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ```
